pages.text: Assigning a gem to another gem is easy.$(br2)Take an assignment contract, right click the gem that you want to be the owner of another gem; then take that modified contract and right click another gem.

That gem will now be assigned to another gem and will display a special tag under her name that's green in color.$(br2)To make your gem follow her assigned gem, change her movement mode with shift-right click.
Assignment contracts are used to tell gems to follow other gems.
